reviewText: Bought this for my sister. So beneficial for people who want to help themselves and do their best to stay mobile
I love this video series.  My local PBS channel use to carry it but I don't see it on the schedule.  I have been doing chair yoga for almost a year and love it.
I LOVE HER VIDEOS BUT WISH WE KNEW ABOUT THE BALLS AND WHAT SIZE,ETC., AHEAD OF TIME SO WOULD HAVE THEM ON HAND.

I didn't see much of a work out with this program.  Was to short. I didn't feel that I had had a work out at all.  Was boring also.
I was hoping for a longer program with more things to do.
Very pleased with the Sit and Be Fit dvd. Excellent condition. Have a bad foot so really helps do some exercises.

This DVD gives you a good perspective and good motivation about exercising no matter what your fit level or physical limitation (whether that limitation is permanent or temporary). This is slow, chair-based, easy workouts with an EXTREMELY MINUTE emphasis on diabetes.  Exercisers of all ages are shown (yay!). Adaptations for standing are covered. The music is not to our taste. If you're unfamiliar, take a look at the TV show, "Sit and Be Fit", before buying the DVD.
This is a wonderful way to exercise even when you are seated in a chair.  A well done and encouraging workout.
